title: Kare ga Megane wo Hazusutoki
description: "Could I take the place of my brother?" When Tomoe's best friend, Ichita develops an interest in the new transfer student, it affects Tomoe. Not knowing the reason for this, a corner of his heart slows. In the wake of all that, he becomes close with Ichita's younger brother, Kenji. The two of them meet, but one day, on top of pointing out Tomoe's feelings for Ichita, Kenji also confesses his own feelings. It's a story full of waves and waves of emotions and angst youth.
